an5.230:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of a black snake.
an5.230:4.3: It’s angry, hostile, venomous, fork-tongued, and treacherous.
an5.230:4.4: These are the five dangers of a black snake.
an5.230:5.1: In the same way there are five drawbacks of a female.
an5.230:5.3: She’s angry, hostile, venomous, fork-tongued, and treacherous.
an5.230:5.6: This is a female’s forked tongue:
an5.230:5.10: These are the five drawbacks of a female.”
